answers.answer: Hi,How is your brother feeling? I feel the symptoms indeed appear to be due to allergic reaction.I am not sure whether it is due to allergic reaction to aspirin or not as it does not appear that Aspirin can cause such a reaction. You need to also see a dermatologist for a planned intervention. Do you feel the skin over the rash is making some crackling sound?If yes, then it might be gangrene. Does your brother have diabetes? If yes, the rash could be due to any allergies which are complicated by Diabetes. If he does not have one then you can check for diabetes on him.Anti-histamines with Antibiotics with Anti-fungal need to be tried for his current ailment.Keep me informed if you have any queries.Bye.

question: Hi Doc,My brother has had a sore on his lower shin that started as a rash with watery bumps.  The area eventually got vey swollen, dark and shiny till it became a sore.  He has been to the DR. who ran xrays, blood tests and also a biopsy.  He was told that the only possible conclusion was that he had an allergic reaction to aspirin.  I am not convinced as despite antibiotics and creams, the area from which the biopsy was taken has stll not healed for over a year.  His ankle sometimes gets swollen and painful and I am concerned that ther might be something seroiusly wrong.
title: Skin infection/sore
